#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
              int n;
              int x,y,z;
              scanf("%d %d %d %d",&n,&x,&y,&z);
              
              int num=x*100+y*10+z;
              
              int i,j,found=0;
              for(i=9;i>=1;i--)
              {
                               for(j=9;j>=0;j--)
                               {
                                                if(!((((i*1000+num)*10)+j)%n))
                                                {
                                                    found=1;
                                                    break;                   
                                                                       }
                                                }
                               if(found)
                               break;
                               }
              if(found)
              printf("%d %d %d\n",i,j,((((i*1000+num)*10)+j)/n));
              else
              printf("0\n");
              }
    return 0;
}
